name: TorrentFreak v5 2011 - XW
description:
An improved look for Torrentfreak's awful site redesign, launched in January 2011. 

This style is based on style 23309 by user 27111

The style removes/hides the right-hand sidebar, permitting a full-width page for articles. 

The titlebar is pink/black, while the article/page background use shades of pastel blue.

*changelog*
21-Jan-2011;  
* Initial version

31-Jan-2011;
* improve in-article link color/highlighting
* fix: h3 text was not displaying in the article body.
